Translations.Text: Nihsandeha amara eti abatarana karechi mahimanbita rajanite.
Ara ki tomake bujhate debe mahimanbita rajaniti ki
mahimanbita rajani hacche hajara masera ca'ite'o srestha.
Phirisâ€Œtagana o ruh tate abatirna haya tadera prabhura anumatikrame pratiti byapara sanbandhe
santi -- phajarera udaya paryanta ta calate thakabe.
